narrative.title: 7Th Armoured Division - 1940Q2

situation.formation_history: Renamed from Mobile Division (Egypt) on 16 February 1940. Originally formed 27 September 1938 as Mobile Division Egypt. Adopted 'Desert Rats' jerboa insignia 16 April 1940, confirmed May 1940.
situation.operational_status: Defensive posture along Egyptian-Libyan frontier. Italy entered war 10 June 1940. First combat: 11th Hussars and 1st KRRC crossed into Libya 11 June 1940, took 70 Italian prisoners.
quarter_events: 14 April 1940: Armoured brigades drop 'heavy' and 'light' descriptors
11 June 1940: First combat operations into Libya
17 June 1940: Western Desert Force formed under Major-General Richard O'Connor
situation.commonwealth_forces: Division is entirely British at this time. Indian forces present in theater (4th Indian Division) but not attached to 7th Armoured Division during Q2 1940.

narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.
